definition: To gain knowledge or information about something, typically through personal experience or observation. It is commonly used when referring to acquiring knowledge through direct involvement or firsthand understanding.

examples.german: Ich erwisse, dass er gelogen hat.
examples.english: I found out that he lied.

examples.german: Sie erwissen, dass er schuldig ist.
examples.english: They discover that he is guilty.

examples.german: Ich erwisse, dass sie betrogen hat.
